name: Pseudodragon
senses: Blindsight 10 ft., Darkvision 60 ft., Passive Perception 13
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Limited Telepathy
traits.description: Can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 ft. of it that can understand a language.

actions.name: Sting
actions.description: *Melee:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing plus the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition for 1 hour. If the target fails the save by 5 or more, the target has the Poisoned and Unconscious conditions for the same duration.
